co.cask.cdap.api.spark
Class AbstractSpark

java.lang.Object
  co.cask.cdap.api.spark.AbstractSpark
All Implemented Interfaces:
Spark
public abstract class AbstractSpark
extends Object
implements Spark

This abstract class provides a default implementation of Spark methods for easy extension.

onFinish

public void onFinish(boolean succeeded,
                     SparkContext context)
              throws Exception
Description copied from interface: Spark
Invoked after a Spark job finishes. Will not be called if: Job failed to start.

Specified by:
onFinish in interface Spark
Parameters:
succeeded - defines the result of job execution: true if job succeeded, false otherwise
context - job execution context
Throws:
Exception - if there's an error during this method invocation.
